author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Addresses one of the concerns in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/5567

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Make sense to cache WMF on CIs?

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body:
@iSazonov I think the point of the test is to make sure the prerequisite links are still valid so we don't have stale links in the documentation. Caching WMF would provide no benefit there.

Are these links available in the windows installer somehow?

title: Output url being validated for pre-req test so when test fails you can more easily troubleshoot
